entity.name: The White House

text:
@WhiteHouse 325 Million + people would beg to differ.

That is the amount that still needs to be tested.

Aren't you the ones lauding your high numbers?

What are you afraid of now?

#NeverForget #RedDawnEmails #DictatorTrump 
#TrumpIsAnIdiot
